sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The United Nations warns of an impending humanitarian catastrophe in Gaza as hospitals are on the verge of running out of fuel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Jordan's king and Germany's chancellor meet to discuss the war and growing humanitarian crisis in the Middle East.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Russia's lower house of parliament unanimously approves revoking the nuclear test ban treaty in the first of three votes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands of Palestinians are arriving at this hospital in southern Gaza every day, not only to heal their injuries but also to seek refuge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Water is run out at UN shelters across the enclave and hospitals are seen as the last safe haven from the Israeli offensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: across the enclave and hospitals are seen as the last safe haven from the Israeli offensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Overwhelmed doctors struggle to take care of patients and fear that any time soon generators will run out of fuel. As residents search through the rubble of destroyed buildings in the hope of finding survivors and loved ones, humanitarian workers have been warned to leave Gaza City, which they've been told is too dangerous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At the rougher border with Egypt, Palestinians trying to escape the intense bombardments have to wait several hours to make it across. Israel has blocked the enclave, leaving Gaza under fire with no access to water, food, fuel or electricity. The United Nations Human Rights Office is Israel's siege of Gaza and its order to over one million Palestinian civilians in the north to evacuate to the south of the enclave could be in breach of international law. Meanwhile, several humanitarian organizations and some countries have shipments of aid waiting at the Egyptian border. But with no agreement in place to be allowed to deliver the relief and security concerns on the Palestinian side, it's unclear when they might pass through.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Jordan's King Abdullah II arrived in Berlin on Tuesday, where he met with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz to discuss the Israel-Hamas war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Scholz has urged Iran and the Lebanese armed group Hezbollah to stay out of the conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Israel's retaliatory bombing of the Gaza Strip has displaced more than a million people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Jordan's king says other countries can't be expected to take responsibility for them. No refugees in Jordan, no refugees in Egypt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This is a situation of humanitarian dimension that hasension, die innerhalb von Gaza und der Westbank umgesetzt werden muss.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Und nicht, um die palästinensische Herausforderung und ihr Zukunft auf die Schulter anderer Menschen zu drücken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Scholz wird diese Woche in Israel reisen. Er wird der erste Regierungsleiter sein, der seit dem Oktober 7 Hamas-Attack besucht wird.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In unserem Entsetzen über die menschenverachtende Gewalt der Hamas-Gewalttäter ist es wichtig zu differenzieren.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Die Palästinenserinnen und Palästinenser sind nicht Hamas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Und die Hamas hat kein Recht, für sie zu sprechen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Die palästinensische Bevölkerung in Gaza, auch sie ist Opfer der Hamas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: US-Präsident Joe Biden ist auch in der Zeit, um einen Kriegszeit-Besuch in Tel Aviv zu machen, in einer Show von Solidarität mit Israel. President Joe Biden is also scheduled to make a wartime visit to Tel Aviv this week in a show of solidarity with Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: He is also expected to raise the issue of aid for Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Biden will later meet with Jordanian, Palestinian and Egyptian leaders in Amman.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Even with diplomatic efforts ramping up, a growing number of foreign nationals are choosing to leave the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Rome is holding a series of special events to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the deportation of more than 1,000 of the city's Jews to the Nazi extermination camp of Auschwitz.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The message is, quote, we remember the past because we care about the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The raid occurred in the ghetto district at dawn on the 16th of October 1943. And two days later, 1,022 Roman Jews, including 200 children, were sent to Auschwitz on a sealed train. Only 16 would make it back to Rome alive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Russia's Duma, or lower house of parliament. Lawmakers there on Tuesday gave preliminary

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: approval to a bill which could see the country revoke the ratification of the comprehensive nuclear test ban treaty. The vote, the first of three readings, was passed unanimously with no abstentions. The Duma describes the move as putting Russia on a par with the United States, which has signed but never ratified the 1996 treaty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In its opening remarks, the treaty states that its goal is to reduce and ultimately eliminate nuclear weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moscow says it will not resume nuclear testing unless Washington does.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Analysts are, however, worried that Russia may be considering a test which could see the resumption of a nuclear arms race.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The final vote on the bill is scheduled for later this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Polish opposition parties led by Donald Tusk are getting ready to discuss a possible coalition government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Zavta official results from Sunday's election showed they'd won enough seats between them to oust the ruling nationalist Law and Justice party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: However, it did win the highest number of votes at just over 35%, giving it around 190 seats in the 460-seat chamber.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So who will actually form the government is complicated and will take some time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The first chance will be given to PIS, then the majority in the parliament will nominate and elect a new government not coming from PIS, then the president needs to approve and if he doesn't there will be the first step that will finally confirm that PIS is most likely out of power but it will take months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Turnout in the polls was a record high of nearly 75%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A coalition government led by pro-EU centrists will be a massive shift in Polish politics after eight years of conflict with Brussels, including over democratic standards and media freedom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Police in Italy and Spain have dealt a blow to a suspected group of international drug traffickers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In a joint operation, 58 people have been arrested on suspicion of international drug trafficking, money laundering and fraud.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Italy, the arrests took place in Milan, Turin, Rome and Catania in Sicily.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Agents seized assets worth 129 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sicily. Agents seized assets worth 129 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some 400 officers participated in the police operation, carrying out a total of 96 searches in Italy, Switzerland and Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The year-long investigation had focused on the suspicious movement of money through clandestine banking services run by ethnic Chinese.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's estimated the network supplied around 30 million tons of hashish and marijuana.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron has awarded France's highest honor to French-Albanian author Ismael Cadare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The author, internationally known for his 1963 novel The General of the Dead Army, internationally known for his 1963 novel The General of the Dead Army, was given the title Grand Officer of the Legion of Honor by the French president in ceremony in the Albanian capital, Tirana. Cadare has been awarded a number of international prizes for his works, which include more than 80 novels, plays, screenplays, poetry, essays, or story collections translated into different languages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Bunches of flowers and candles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The northern city of Arras in France has held a vigil for the school teacher who was stabbed to death by a former student last week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The victim was 57-year-old Dominique Bernard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Three other adults were also injured, one of whom is in critical condition. The suspect is a radicalized extremist of Chechen origin, and the government is calling the incident an Islamic terror attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The homage on Monday also paid tribute to teacher Samuel Paty, beheaded exactly three years ago by Islamic extremists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Greta Thunberg has been arrested after protesting against the oil industry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Swedish climate activist demonstrated in London against a meeting between representatives of the British government and the oil industry in the framework of the so-called Energy Intelligence Forum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Surrounded by activists, Thunberg accused them of going in the wrong direction and depleting a dying planet to enrich a few.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Five other people have also been arrested for obstructing traffic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Walt Disney Studios has released a new trailer to celebrate 100 years of cinema.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Once Upon a Studio features 543 Disney characters from more than 85 feature-length and short films, celebrating 10 decades of storytelling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It's also releasing 10 classic animated films and cinemas across the world for a limited time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: However, numerous actors celebrated in their own way by going on strike in front of Disney headquarters in Los Angeles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Avant Garde in Georgia at Bazaar is one of the main highlights of this autumn's Europalia Arts Festival in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The exhibition centers on the first three decades of the 20th century when the art scene flourished in the South Caucasus country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's a period that includes a three-year interlude of independence between the fall of the Russian Empire and the invasion of the Soviet regime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was very important for Georgia and avant-garde not only to study and to build the institutions to research art, but also to use it as a method in their very avant-garde practices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: So it makes the Georgian avant-garde also very exceptional with this connection between the past and the future and the tradition also.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The mixture of Eastern and Western elements is also evident with various styles present in the work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Euronews spoke with Levan Chogosvili, a Georgian artist whose work features heavily in the exhibition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This exhibition is also very good because it shows that our art was very close with European art and so on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Today, many Georgian artists, young artists, of course, they always try to go somewhere in the West and study there and then return.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Visitors can also enjoy a programme of concerts, cinema, dance and theatre at various cultural venues in Belgium until mid-January 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Polyphony, meaning multiple voices, is just one of the core themes of the festival, both in music and as an opportunity for diverse communities to express their views.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The second theme is remembrance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Remembrance is about questioning the past and also to reflect about the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: How do you deal with certain pasts?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: How do you deal with the Soviet regime which still has an impact today?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: So it's also about conflicts from the past, also more recent conflicts like conflicts still going on today in Georgia, in South Ossetia and in Abgasia and also of course the Ukrainian war which has an impact in Georgia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: An important part of the programme is the outcome of creative partnerships between Georgians and artists of other nationalities with the commissioning of specific works for the festival.
